anomalyMod:Derail.NAME: Derail
anomalyMod:Derail.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak. NL Otherwise, apply !M! Vulnerable.

anomalyMod:DualAction.NAME: Dual Action
anomalyMod:DualAction.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

anomalyMod:Apex.NAME: Apex
anomalyMod:Apex.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL After you play !anomalyMod:M2! cards, lose !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

anomalyMod:Backdoor.NAME: Backdoor
anomalyMod:Backdoor.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of Skills you have currently played in a row this turn.

anomalyMod:BlastPipe.NAME: Blast Pipe
anomalyMod:BlastPipe.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Apply !anomalyMod:M2! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

anomalyMod:Blender.NAME: Blender
anomalyMod:Blender.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I wonder... NL Will it blend?

anomalyMod:Blink.NAME: Blink
anomalyMod:Blink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put the bottom card of your draw pile into your hand.

anomalyMod:BudgetPack.NAME: Budget Pack
anomalyMod:BudgetPack.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until all cards in your hand cost at least !M! in total. NL Draw !anomalyMod:M2! card.

anomalyMod:ClockworkCrawl.NAME: Clockwork Crawl
anomalyMod:ClockworkCrawl.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you play !anomalyMod:M2! cards, draw 1 card.

anomalyMod:ClusterCrunch.NAME: Cluster Crunch
anomalyMod:ClusterCrunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever this kills an enemy, deal !D! damage again to the enemy with the least HP.

anomalyMod:Collision.NAME: Collision
anomalyMod:Collision.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double your Block. NL Lose all Block.
anomalyMod:Collision.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double your Block. NL Lose half your Block.

anomalyMod:ConicSands.NAME: Conic Sands
anomalyMod:ConicSands.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, lose [E] and draw 1 less card.
anomalyMod:ConicSands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, lose [E] and draw 1 less card.

anomalyMod:Crank.NAME: Crank
anomalyMod:Crank.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !anomalyMod:M2! Dexterity.

anomalyMod:Decoy.NAME: Decoy
anomalyMod:Decoy.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain [E] next turn and draw !M! card next turn.
anomalyMod:Decoy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain [E] [E] next turn and draw !M! cards next turn.

anomalyMod:DeepDitch.NAME: Deep Ditch
anomalyMod:DeepDitch.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Strength and Vulnerable affect this card twice.
anomalyMod:DeepDitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ONLY positive damage-modifying powers affect this card, twice.

anomalyMod:DeimosDown.NAME: Deimos Down
anomalyMod:DeimosDown.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Xprobability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: We don't use that moon anyway.

anomalyMod:DelayedFlight.NAME: Delayed Flight
anomalyMod:DelayedFlight.DESCRIPTION: After you play !M! cards, gain !B! Block. NL Dexterity affects this card twice.

anomalyMod:DialMForMurder.NAME: Dial M for Murder
anomalyMod:DialMForMurder.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL The first Attack you play each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice.

anomalyMod:Disable.NAME: Disable
anomalyMod:Disable.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy receives double effects from Weak and Vulnerable this turn. NL Exhaust.
anomalyMod:Disable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy receives double effects from Weak and Vulnerable for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

anomalyMod:Discontinuity.NAME: Discontinuity
anomalyMod:Discontinuity.DESCRIPTION: After you play !M! cards, play a copy of the last card you played this combat.
anomalyMod:Discontinuity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL After you play !M! cards, play a copy of the last card you played this combat.

anomalyMod:DoOver.NAME: Do-Over
anomalyMod:DoOver.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Shuffle ALL your cards into your draw pile. NL Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.

anomalyMod:Driller.NAME: Driller
anomalyMod:Driller.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has at least !anomalyMod:M2! Weak or !anomalyMod:M2! Vulnerable, deal !D! damage again !M! times.

anomalyMod:DummyCard.NAME: Dummy
anomalyMod:DummyCard.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Exhausts at the end of your turn from anywhere.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhausts at the end of your turn from anywhere.

anomalyMod:DumpsterDive.NAME: Dumpster Dive
anomalyMod:DumpsterDive.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand for each card discarded. NL Exhaust.

anomalyMod:EmergencyExit.NAME: Emergency Exit
anomalyMod:EmergencyExit.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Xprobability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

anomalyMod:EscapeAttempt.NAME: Escape Attempt
anomalyMod:EscapeAttempt.DESCRIPTION: Discard all but up to !M! cards. NL If you discard at least !anomalyMod:M2! cards, gain !B! Block twice.

anomalyMod:Excavate.NAME: Excavate
anomalyMod:Excavate.DESCRIPTION: Put all but up to !M! cards from your draw pile into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

anomalyMod:ExpirationDate.NAME: Xpiration Date
anomalyMod:ExpirationDate.DESCRIPTION: Xprobability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL After !anomalyMod:M2! turns, lose !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

anomalyMod:ExtraPockets.NAME: Extra Pockets
anomalyMod:ExtraPockets.DESCRIPTION: Raise your Max Hand Size by !M!. NL At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! card.
anomalyMod:ExtraPockets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Raise your Max Hand Size by !M!. NL At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! cards.

anomalyMod:Fak3.NAME: Fak3
anomalyMod:Fak3.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next !M! non-Dummies you play this turn add a Dummy of the same card type into your hand.

anomalyMod:Featherweight.NAME: Featherweight
anomalyMod:Featherweight.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard up to X cards. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] for each card discarded.
anomalyMod:Featherweight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard up to X cards. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] for each card discarded. Retain your hand this turn.

anomalyMod:Filter.NAME: Filter
anomalyMod:Filter.DESCRIPTION: Purge ANY card. NL Next turn, add it into your hand and reduce its Improbability by !M! this combat. NL Exhaust.

anomalyMod:FluxCapacitor.NAME: Flux Capacitor
anomalyMod:FluxCapacitor.DESCRIPTION: Up to !M! Energy is conserved between turns.

anomalyMod:FourEyes.NAME: Four Eyes
anomalyMod:FourEyes.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL At the start of your turn, play the bottom card of your draw pile.

anomalyMod:FreeForm.NAME: Free Form
anomalyMod:FreeForm.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL At the start of your turn, choose 1 of 3 random cards with 1 less Improbability to play.

anomalyMod:Gape.NAME: Gape
anomalyMod:Gape.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, it loses 1 Vulnerable and apply !M! Stapled.

anomalyMod:Hook.NAME: Hook
anomalyMod:Hook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
anomalyMod:Hook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

anomalyMod:Hurdle.NAME: Hurdle
anomalyMod:Hurdle.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !B! Block and gain !B! Block next turn.
anomalyMod:Hurdle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !B! Block and gain !B! Block next turn.

anomalyMod:Hyperdrift.NAME: Hyperdrift
anomalyMod:Hyperdrift.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your draw pile into your hand.

anomalyMod:Invad3r.NAME: Invad3r
anomalyMod:Invad3r.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !anomalyMod:M2! cards.

anomalyMod:Invalidate.NAME: Invalidate
anomalyMod:Invalidate.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Improbability. NL Remove all your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

anomalyMod:Invert.NAME: Invert
anomalyMod:Invert.DESCRIPTION: Reverse your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards.

anomalyMod:Jailbreak.NAME: Jailbreak
anomalyMod:Jailbreak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose a card. NL If it has Improbability, reduce its Improbability by !M!. Otherwise, Upgrade it.
anomalyMod:Jailbreak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose ANY card. NL If it has Improbability, reduce its Improbability by !M!. Otherwise, Upgrade it.

anomalyMod:Krieg.NAME: Krieg
anomalyMod:Krieg.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

anomalyMod:Maladaptation.NAME: Maladaptation
anomalyMod:Maladaptation.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL If you discard a Skill, apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Otherwise, apply !M! Weak.

anomalyMod:Multithreading.NAME: Multithreading
anomalyMod:Multithreading.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL At the start of your next !M! turns, play a copy of it.
anomalyMod:Multithreading.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust a card. NL At the start of your next !M! turns, play a copy of it.

anomalyMod:NegativeReception.NAME: Negative Reception
anomalyMod:NegativeReception.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Discard up to !M! cards. NL Draw 1 card for each type of card discarded.
anomalyMod:NegativeReception.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Discard up to !M! cards. NL Draw 1 card for each card discarded.

anomalyMod:Overdrive.NAME: Overdrive
anomalyMod:Overdrive.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Set this card's Improbability to 1 this combat.
anomalyMod:Overdrive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Set this card's Improbability to 1 this combat.

anomalyMod:Pincushion.NAME: Pincushion
anomalyMod:Pincushion.DESCRIPTION: Xprobability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage !anomalyMod:M2! times. NL Apply !M! Stapled !anomalyMod:M2! times. NL Exhaust.

anomalyMod:PopcornFunction.NAME: Popcorn Function
anomalyMod:PopcornFunction.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

anomalyMod:Preloader.NAME: Preloader
anomalyMod:Preloader.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Startup: Gain [E] and draw !M! card.
anomalyMod:Preloader.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust. NL Startup: Gain [E] and draw !M! card.

anomalyMod:Procrastinate.NAME: Procrastinate
anomalyMod:Procrastinate.DESCRIPTION: Purge a card. NL Next turn, add and play it. NL Exhaust.
anomalyMod:Procrastinate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Purge a card. NL Next turn, add and play it.

anomalyMod:RedWorld.NAME: Red World
anomalyMod:RedWorld.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Improbability and !M! Strength.

anomalyMod:Riftwalk.NAME: Riftwalk
anomalyMod:Riftwalk.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Gain !B! Block !M! times. NL Apply !anomalyMod:M2! Vulnerable.

anomalyMod:SawBones.NAME: Saw Bones
anomalyMod:SawBones.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Weak, it loses 1 Weak and !M! Strength.

anomalyMod:Seeker.NAME: Seeker
anomalyMod:Seeker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card.

anomalyMod:SixthRevision.NAME: Seventh Revision
anomalyMod:SixthRevision.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may shuffle an upgradable card from your discard pile into your draw pile and Upgrade it.

anomalyMod:SmoothSailing.NAME: Smooth Sailing
anomalyMod:SmoothSailing.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next !M! turns, gain [E].

anomalyMod:SocketSlice.NAME: Socket Slice
anomalyMod:SocketSlice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last 2 cards you played this combat were Attacks, apply !M! Weak.

anomalyMod:SystemHack.NAME: System Hack
anomalyMod:SystemHack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Your next card has !M! less Improbability.

anomalyMod:TelomereFlake.NAME: Telomere Flake
anomalyMod:TelomereFlake.DESCRIPTION: Put the top and bottom cards of your draw pile into your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
anomalyMod:TelomereFlake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put the top and bottom cards of your draw pile into your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

anomalyMod:Timeslip.NAME: Timeslip
anomalyMod:Timeslip.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, put the bottom card of your draw pile into your hand.
anomalyMod:Timeslip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, put the bottom card of your draw pile into your hand.

anomalyMod:Torment.NAME: Torment
anomalyMod:Torment.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Apply !anomalyMod:M2! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

anomalyMod:Trailmixing.NAME: Trailmixing
anomalyMod:Trailmixing.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw !M! cards.

anomalyMod:TrashChute.NAME: Trash Chute
anomalyMod:TrashChute.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, put up to !M! cards from your draw pile into your discard pile.

anomalyMod:TrenchWarfare.NAME: Trench Warfare
anomalyMod:TrenchWarfare.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard up to 3 cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each type of card discarded.

anomalyMod:WarpDrive.NAME: Warp Drive
anomalyMod:WarpDrive.DESCRIPTION: Improbability !anomalyMod:I!. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.
